input_text:
Job Title: Buffet Attendant | Full-time (AM Shift) 

Location: Austin, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Organization- Hyatt Regency Austin

Summary

Nestled on the shores of Lady Bird Lake, in the heart of downtown Austin is, Hyatt Regency Austin, where c aring for people to be their best is our purpose and the foundation of all that we do! We are in search of a friendly and reliable Buffet Runner to join our team and provide excellent service to our guests.

The Buffet Runner is primarily responsible for setting up, breaking down and maintaining buffet items, ensuring that they are fresh, hot, and appealing. Responsibilities will also include transporting food from the kitchen to the buffet, ensuring that buffet items are properly stocked, maintaining the cleanliness and sanitation of the buffet area, equipment, and utensils. They will also assist with running food from the kitchen to guest tables in the restaurant and/or the lobby bar, and assisting guests as needed.

This shift stats at 5:00am, therefore early morning, weekend and holiday availability is required.

BENEFITS! |  We care for people so they can be their best. Our colleagues enjoy:

 Career Growth and Advancement – Hyatt believes strongly in promoting from within. We offer training, skills development & career mobility, providing opportunities for advancement at every level Affordable Benefits after 30 days – full-time colleagues are eligible for medical, dental, vision, life, LTD, STD Referral Bonuses up to $500.00 - for bringing new members to our team Discounted Room Nights - at Hyatt Hotels around the world 12 Free Hyatt Room Nights per year – after 90 days of service Free Parking – Downtown Austin in our on-site garage! Discounted Bus Passes – subsidized by Hyatt, paid through payroll deduction Paid Time Off – after 90 days of service  Healthcare FSA - saves you money for medical expenses Financial Assistance – T uition & Gym reimbursement Financial Perks - 401(k) w/ company match & discounted employee stock purchase plan Employee Assistance – Daily employee meal, 24/7 emotional support, legal guidance, personal & financial resources

Hyatt is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status. 

Qualifications

 A positive attitude and a friendly personality A high school diploma or equivalent Previous experience as Buffet Attendant or Food Runner role is preferred but not required Prior experience in food service or hospitality is preferred A valid Texas food handler’s certificate A flexible schedule that includes early mornings, weekend and holiday availability A positive attitude and a customer-oriented approach The ability to work in a fast-paced environment and multitask

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Buffet Attendant | Full-time (AM Shift)
output_json.summary: Friendly and reliable Buffet Runner needed at Hyatt Regency Austin.
job_responsibilities: Setting up, breaking down, and maintaining buffet items
Transporting food from the kitchen to the buffet
Maintaining cleanliness and sanitation of the buffet area, equipment, and utensils
Assisting with running food from the kitchen to guest tables
benefits: Discounted room nights at Hyatt Hotels
12 free Hyatt room nights per year
Paid time off after 90 days of service
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Hyatt is an equal opportunity employer.

other.content: Positive attitude, friendly personality, high school diploma or equivalent, previous experience in food service or hospitality, valid Texas food handler’s certificate, flexible schedule including early mornings, weekends, and holidays, customer-oriented approach, ability to work in a fast-paced environment and multitask.
